column1: B00014D944,"https://www.amazon.com/PROLAB-Glutamine-Powder-400-Grams/product-reviews/B00014D944/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_show_all_btm?ie=UTF8&reviewerType=all_reviews","I had a better one","As far as i know that all kinds of Glutamin give the same result.What I don't like about this one is the test. It changes the test in a way that i don't really like.. for that reason I avoid taking glutamin sometime.. it's not that bad, but I remember i had a better one that has no taste at all.I believe I will for another one once I finish this one.Good luck feeding your hungry muscles :)","3.0 out of 5 stars","March 19, 2014","Rakan","GLUTAMINE is a flavorless, easy-mixing and extremely versatile free form amino acid. Supplementing with GLUTAMINE replenishes depleted stores to help build new lean muscle, protect hard-earned gains and support cell volumization making muscle cells look and feel full and dense. GLUTAMINE also supports post-workout muscle energy repletion and repair helping to maximize recovery after intense training. Widely recognized as a long-standing nutrition company, PROLAB Nutrition LLC has been providing professional and aspiring bodybuilders and elite athletes with high quality sports nutrition products since 1989. Always an innovator, PROLAB Nutrition LLC helped pioneer a sports-specific approach to athletes' nutrition. PROLAB’s products allow athletes to customize a nutritional supplement program to meet specific training and physique goals due to our comprehensive product line.","Flavorless, easy-mixing and extremely versatile free-form amino acid that helps build and protect lean muscle
Supports cell volumization making muscles look and feel more full and dense
Helps maximize recovery after intense training
Supports a healthy immune system
400-gram bottle"

B00014D6QU,"https://www.amazon.com/JASON-Renewal-Vitamin-Moisturizing-Container/product-reviews/B0013G6M8O/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_show_all_btm?ie=UTF8&reviewerType=all_reviews","Mild and effective moisturizer!","My girlfriend has an intense Korean-inspired skincare routine and kept recommending I use a moisturizer. I have semi-oily skin that gets very dry after washing, which creates more oil over the course of the day, and then sets in this vicious cycle where I can't find a happy medium. After using this creme in the morning after a shower, my skin stays balanced. Moisturized, but not greasy. Now my skin tends to get less oily throughout the day. The creme itself feels very smooth and mild, and doesn't have a scent, which is a must for me. I also picked up some small cosmetic spatulas to scoop out the creme so that I'm not dipping my fingers into the jar every time. I feel like with some of this skincare stuff it's hard to tell if it's doing anything beneficial, but I really could tell the difference with the Jason creme. Definitely would recommend!","5.0 out of 5 stars","January 23, 2018","Chris W","JASON Age Renewal Vitamin E 25,000 IU Moisturizing Crème delivers deep, long-lasting hydration to help minimize the visible signs of skin aging. Our botanically-rich skin cream is infused with vitamin E and avocado oil to replenish lost moisture and help restore elasticity and resilience. Over time, skin becomes softer, smoother and more youthful looking. Our moisturizing crème is made with safe, gentler and effective ingredients and contains no parabens, sulfates, phthalates or petrolatum. It is also not tested on animals. The JASON brand believes in the power of nature's ingredients to improve everyday wellness. We were pioneers of safer, wholesome personal care, and we continue to harness the earth's bounty of botanicals and essentials for blends that refresh and restore. Wellness is our second nature, and it has been since 1959.","One 4 oz. container of JASON Age Renewal Vitamin E 25,000 IU Moisturizing Crème
Provides deep, long-lasting moisture to help minimize the visible signs of skin aging
Infused with vitamin E and avocado oil
Free of parabens, sulfates, phthalates and petrolatum
Not tested on animals"

B00014D6QU,"https://www.amazon.com/JASON-Renewal-Vitamin-Moisturizing-Container/product-reviews/B0013G6M8O/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_show_all_btm?ie=UTF8&reviewerType=all_reviews","I did a lot of research to find a good moisturizer. This came recommended from some sites after ...","I did a lot of research to find a good moisturizer. This came recommended from some sites after a search for vegan, cruelty-free, and in general something with as few chemicals as possible.I use it on my face, chin and chest, but what prompted me to write this review was what it did for a healing BURN on my arm.About a week ago I burned the underside of my arm (you know, the pale part that shows scares easily). The scab is almost gone, but the rest was still bright. It looked like a bright pink comet on my arm. Last night it was VERY itchy and driving me crazy!! I had enough so instead of using neosporin like I usually do, I reached for this. It's been less than 12 hours and the redness was reduced by 50-60%!!!!!!!!!!!I am BLOWN AWAY. B00014D6QU,"https://www.amazon.com/JASON-Renewal-Vitamin-Moisturizing-Container/product-reviews/B0013G6M8O/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_show_all_btm?ie=UTF8&reviewerType=all_reviews","Very nice product but be aware it is very thick.","My order from Amazon has not arrived yet, however, a friend gave me a jar of Jason Vitamin E Cream to try in the meantime.  I love that the product has no smell as I am very sensitive to strong perfume smells in facial products.  It is a very nice cream, just be aware that it is very thick and slightly heavy so a small amount goes a really long way.  I use it after the shower on my face, and neck.  My only objection is that is remains sticky on my face under make up.  So as a new user, I am not sure of the long term benefits of this product.  That will have to come later. B00014DMG4,"https://www.amazon.com/Olbas-LIN-Inhaler-0-01-Ounce/product-reviews/B00014DMG4/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_show_all_btm?ie=UTF8&reviewerType=all_reviews","I thought wonderful relief from a safe, natural product was not possible.  Boy was I wrong.  This works great!","As a night time stuffiness sufferer, I have tried breathe right strips, saline sprays, OTC allergy meds like Flonase, and other natural dry nose products with no real benefit.  While Benzedrex inhaler does help, it has some nasty chemicals from what I've read and I had wanted to find something safer.  After a week with Olbas I can definitively say it works great.  It is not a cure, but it does offer relief by opening my nasal passage by my unscientific estimate of 25% and has an immediate effect.  By comparison, breathe right strips claim to open passages up by as much as 38% (not for me), but those didn't do much for me and left a red line across my nose all day long after wearing at night.  I feel I have slept better after a couple sniffs of Olbas and while it does not always last all night, I fall asleep more easily and sleep more deeply for most of the night.  On a couple occasions I did wake up in the morning still breathing clearly so my hope is that the effects may be cumulative or that possibly some healing is taking place that may continue to improve my breathing.  I am generally skeptical of claims about the effectiveness of ""natural"" products but I have found this product lives up to the hype.  I strongly recommend this product for safe, temporary relief of mild to moderate sinus restriction (congestion/inflammation).  Not for small children, read the label.","5.0 out of 5 stars","October 15, 2016","E. Heinrich","Natural Olbas vapors provide a pleasant, refreshing, and cooling sensation to your nasal passages. Helps you endure seasonal discomfort, low humidity and other unwelcome nasal encounters
Provides an immediate fresh and clean feeling in nose, sinuses and lungs"

I was hoping to increase the amount of milk I was able to pump with this product. I took the lowest recommended dose for one day (2 pills 3 times in one day). I noticed the maple syrup smell in my sweat right away. I’m not sure it affected my milk supply at all, and I didn’t experience any adverse effects, but it gave my son tummy troubles. It caused him to have issues with gas which made him very fussy, and his BMs became very watery. Even though I only took one day’s worth, it took several days to get it out of my system. I was hoping this would make things easier, but it ended up causing us more trouble than we had at the start. ORGANICALLY GROWN: Kyolic's high quality nutritional supplements start out with organically grown garlic, because we know that the greatest health benefits come from the cleanest natural sources, whether in a capsule, tablet, softgel gel cap, or liquid.

Its use in folk remedies dates back centuries, and people have long believed it to provide health benefits of various sorts.Well, thanks to modern science, some of these claims are actually being verified in proper studies. Initial results show a whole lot of potential for garlic as a natural and safe way to improve cholesterol levels and treat hypertension. Even though it's unlikely that all of garlic's claimed healing properties will be verified, it's already looking like it does more good than harm on the cardiovascular front, and that's enough for me to dive in.There's a catch, though; not all garlic supplements are created equal. It's got to be tempting to grab one of those garlic oil based products which is much cheaper per ""equivalent"" garlic does, but don't be fooled: they don't seem to provide all of the same health benefits. Short of using fresh garlic (which you can and should do sometimes for taste, if nothing else!) aged garlic extract is the next best thing. Don't settle for less!Kyolic makes a dizzying array of subtly different garlic products, but this one is by all appearances the best. Aged garlic extract? Check. No other weird additives? Check. Proper dosage? Check. Although it looks expensive, very few (if any) other products on the market give you as high a dose of the good stuff for as low a price. Look carefully and although they may be cheaper, they're dishing out ""equivalent"" doses or lower doses, requiring you to take multiple pills to reach the efficacy of this product.So, dear reader, buy with confidence. B00014DJL2,"https://www.amazon.com/Natures-Way-Fenugreek-Certified-Vegetarian/product-reviews/B00014DJL2/ref=cm_cr_arp_d_paging_btm_2?ie=UTF8&pageNumber=2&reviewerType=all_reviews","Think Twice Before Using!","I have low milk supply, and I was looking for something to boost it, like a lot of people are with this product. First, I really didn’t mind the maple syrup smell. I actually liked that smell better than my BO, and it seemed like I was sweating less in general. Sweet! Now come almost a week later (of taking 2 pills twice a day), my baby hadn’t really pooped much, and when he did he started having diarrhea a couple times a day. After the 2nd day of the loose stools I looked up feugreek side effects and diarrhea in the baby is one of them. Immediately stopped taking the pills but took another week for it to be out of my system. This whole time my supply hadn’t changed, and I also had loose stool in my baby to worry about. Obviously everyone’s body is different, but I would try other things to boost milk supply before turning to this.","2.0 out of 5 stars","January 8, 2019","Aibreán Hart","Non-GMO","Fenugreek is an annual Mediterranean and Asiatic herb with aromatic seeds.

column1: B00014CZV2,"https://www.amazon.com/Clear-Lungs-Classic-Label-Capsules/product-reviews/B00014CZV2/ref=cm_cr_arp_d_paging_btm_2?ie=UTF8&pageNumber=2&reviewerType=all_reviews","Oh what a relief it is","I recently came down with a cold that went directly into my lungs. It turned into a horrible cough that the doctor ended up saying was chronic bronchitis and asthma-related. I coughed coughed coughed and coughed until I almost broke my rib. I tried everything and was even given and inhaler buy a pulmonary specialist. Even the inhaler did not give me any relief from the rattling sensation in my lungs. Everytime I lay down to go to sleep the rattling was incredibly bad and resulted in chronic coughing. I could not stop it. After reading the reviews on clear lungs red I decided to give the product I try. It was like a miracle period within a few hours I started to get some relief period within a day two two days the rattling was gone and I continue to improve. I took two capsules every four to six hours initially. Now I've backed it down to 1 in the morning and one at night. You can't go wrong with giving this a try.","5.0 out of 5 stars","December 7, 2016","Joseph A. Susoreny","ClearLungs is a unique blend of Chinese herbs that helps maintain clear breathing, keep airways open and mucus levels normal.","ClearLungs is a unique blend of chinese herbs that helps maintain free breathing"

B00013YZRU,"https://www.amazon.com/Nutricology-NC51540-Progreens-9-27-Ounce/product-reviews/B00013YZRU/ref=cm_cr_arp_d_paging_btm_3?ie=UTF8&pageNumber=3&reviewerType=all_reviews","Almost there","One of many supplements I've tried, and so far its my #2 pick.  The pros are that it contains excellent ingredients that are well-cared for, organic, it's gluten-free, dairy-free, and also contains probiotics.  The cons are that it tastes/smells like fish food to me (and I've read things about citric acid compromising the integrity of the ingredients so I only mix with water, cold green tea, or apple juice), it doesn't mix well with only a spoon (i needed a milk frother), and even when thoroughly-mixed it can still have a grainy/sandy texture I wasn't a fan of (but one that plagued most of the green drinks I've tried).  The other thing that bothered me was the way the spoon was packaged in there... it has such a long stem that they have to put it in upside-down with the scoop end facing up, which means until you lessen the level of progreens in the container, you're touching the scoop and the scoop handle for awhile (and accidentally getting little bits spilled on the counter in the process).  Once I had less in the container I just cut the spoon in half and now it rest spoon-side down, so I no longer have to touch and possibly contaminate the part of the spoon that touches the product.  Maybe that's not a big deal to anyone else, but it was a little peeve of mine.The best product I've tried so far is actually local to me (Pittsburgh, PA) and I was given a free sample at a Right By Nature store.  Its ingredients were very similar to Progreens, as was the care they take with them, but their product mixed a bit better and has some stevia added so that it tasted pretty decent with just plain water.  It was called Go4Greens, and I don't see them selling it on amazon or ebay, but if you google it you'll find their website.  I would've never known they existed had we not stumbled on that free sample table (the person with me also agreed that their product mixed better and tasted better than what she was trying currently as well--- vitamineral green).","3.0 out of 5 stars","October 22, 2010","David J. Acacia Honey is dark in color and is prized for its delicate, fruity taste and mild, tangy finish.","100% organic raw Acacia Honey conveniently packaged in a 12 ounce plastic squeeze bottle. Acacia Honey is dark in color and is prized for its delicate, fruity taste and mild, tangy finish. Great for: spreading on breads, drizzling into yogurts and on fruits, cereals, and pancakes, or adding to your herbal and green teas. Makes a wonderful baste for fish and meat.
Region: Our organic raw Acacia Honey originates from wild beehives located in the secluded valleys of the Jammu region of the Himalayan Mountains, in India.

Process: We harvest our honey from naturally occurring, wild beehives allowing the bees to pollinate foliage far from chemicals and additives. This pure natural honey is obtained by using bee-friendly and smoke free methods that protect the wild bee colonies and preserve our forests. Our honey is raw and lightly filtered, to preserve vital vitamins, minerals and enzymes.

Advantages: Bee pollen found in raw wildflower honey contains a wide array of essential vitamins, minerals & live enzymes: Vitamins B6, B12, C; Calcium, Magnesium, Sodium, Potassium, Iron; Antibacterial, antimicrobial and antioxidant properties from Vitamin E, Vitamin C, and Selenium.

Features: Raw, 100% USDA Organic Certified, Non-GMO Project Verified, Fair Trade Certified, Dairy Free, Nut Free, Gluten Free, OU Kosher Certified, Sustainably Harvested, Wild Collected, Bee Friendly."
